verses.verse: <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to all <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8085>them,<s%> Hear, <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> which I <S%H1696>speak<s%> in your <S%H241>ears<s%> this <S%H3117>day,<s%> that you may <S%H3925>learn<s%> <S%H8104>them,<s%> and observe to do <S%H6213>them.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with us in <S%H2722>Horeb.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3772>didn't<s%> make this <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> but with <S%H587>us,<s%> even <S%H587>us,<s%> who are all of us here <S%H2416>alive<s%> this <S%H3117>day.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with you <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H6440>face<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire,<s%>

(I <S%H5975>stood<s%> between <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> and you at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> to <S%H5046>show<s%> you the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> for you were <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H5927>didn't<s%> go up onto the <S%H2022>mountain;<s%>) <S%H559>saying,<s%>
"I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> who brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage.<s%>
"You shall have no <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> before <S%H6440>me.<s%>

"You shall not <S%H6213>make<s%> an engraved <S%H6459>image<s%> for <S%H8544>yourself,<s%> any likeness of what is in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H4605>above,<s%> or what is in the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H4325>beneath,<s%> or that is in the water under the <S%H776>earth:<s%>

you shall not bow <S%H7812>down<s%> yourself to <S%H5647>them,<s%> nor serve <S%H3068>them;<s%> for I, Yahweh, your <S%H430>God,<s%> am a <S%H7067>jealous<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H6485>visiting<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> on the <S%H1121>children,<s%> and on the <S%H8029>third<s%> and on the <S%H7256>fourth<s%> generation of those who hate <S%H8130>me;<s%>
and <S%H6213>showing<s%> loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to <S%H505>thousands<s%> of those who <S%H157>love<s%> me and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>

"You shall not <S%H5375>take<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H7723>vain:<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will not hold him <S%H5352>guiltless<s%> who <S%H5375>takes<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> in <S%H7723>vain.<s%>
<S%H8104>"Observe<s%> the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> it <S%H3068>holy,<s%> as Yahweh your <S%H430>God<s%> commanded <S%H6680>you.<s%>
You shall <S%H5647>labor<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> all your <S%H4399>work;<s%>

but the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> is a <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> in which you shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> any <S%H4399>work,<s%> <S%H1121>you,<s%> nor your son, nor your <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> nor your male <S%H5650>servant,<s%> nor your female <S%H519>servant,<s%> nor your <S%H7794>ox,<s%> nor your <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> nor any of your <S%H929>livestock,<s%> nor your <S%H1616>stranger<s%> who is within your <S%H8179>gates;<s%> that your male <S%H5650>servant<s%> and your female <S%H519>servant<s%> may rest as well as <S%H5117>you.<s%>

You shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> that you were a <S%H5650>servant<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out of there by a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> and by an <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm:<s%> therefore <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you to <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H3513>"Honor<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%> and your <S%H517>mother,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3117>you;<s%> that your days may be <S%H748>long,<s%> and that it may go <S%H3190>well<s%> with <S%H127>you,<s%> in the land which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> gives <S%H5414>you.<s%>
"You shall not <S%H7523>murder.<s%>
"Neither shall you commit <S%H5003>adultery.<s%>
"Neither shall you <S%H1589>steal.<s%>
"Neither shall you <S%H6030>give<s%> <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H5707>testimony<s%> against your <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%>

"Neither shall you <S%H2530>covet<s%> your <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H802>wife;<s%> neither shall you <S%H183>desire<s%> your <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> his <S%H7704>field,<s%> or his male <S%H5650>servant,<s%> or his female <S%H519>servant,<s%> his <S%H7794>ox,<s%> or his <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> or anything that is your <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s."

These <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to all your <S%H6951>assembly<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire,<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and of the thick <S%H6205>darkness,<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6963>voice:<s%> and he added no <S%H3254>more.<s%> He <S%H3789>wrote<s%> them on <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone,<s%> and gave them to <S%H5414>me.<s%>

It <S%H8085>happened,<s%> when you heard the <S%H6963>voice<s%> out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> while the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> was <S%H1197>burning<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> that you came <S%H7126>near<s%> to <S%H7218>me,<s%> even all the heads of your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> and your <S%H2205>elders;<s%>

and you <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068>"Behold,<s%> Yahweh our <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H7200>shown<s%> us his <S%H3519>glory<s%> and his <S%H1433>greatness,<s%> and we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%> out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire:<s%> we have <S%H7200>seen<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> does <S%H1696>speak<s%> with <S%H120>man,<s%> and he <S%H2425>lives.<s%>

Now therefore why should we <S%H4191>die?<s%> For this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> will <S%H398>consume<s%> <S%H8085>us:<s%> if we hear the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> any <S%H3254>more,<s%> then we shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>

For who is there of all <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> that has <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire,<s%> as we <S%H2421>have,<s%> and lived?

Go <S%H7126>near,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> all that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H559>say:<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> us all that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H1696>tell<s%> <S%H8085>you;<s%> and we will hear <S%H6213>it,<s%> and do it."

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H1697>words,<s%> when you <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H3068>me;<s%> and Yahweh <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H8085>me,<s%> "I have heard the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H5971>people,<s%> which they have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to <S%H3190>you:<s%> they have well said all that they have <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

Oh that there were <S%H2088>such<s%> <S%H4310>a<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> in <S%H5414>them,<s%> that they would <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H8104>me,<s%> and keep all my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H3117>always,<s%> that it might be <S%H3190>well<s%> with <S%H1121>them,<s%> and with their children <S%H5769>forever!<s%>
<S%H3212>"Go<s%> <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H7725>them,<s%> Return to your <S%H168>tents.<s%>

But as for <S%H5975>you,<s%> stand here by <S%H5978>me,<s%> and I will <S%H1696>tell<s%> you all the <S%H4687>commandment,<s%> and the <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and the <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> which you shall <S%H3925>teach<s%> <S%H6213>them,<s%> that they may do them in the <S%H776>land<s%> which I <S%H5414>give<s%> them to possess <S%H3423>it.<s%>"

You shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> therefore as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H5493>you:<s%> you shall not turn aside to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left.<s%>

You shall <S%H3212>walk<s%> in all the <S%H1870>way<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H2421>you,<s%> that you may live, and that it may be <S%H2895>well<s%> with <S%H748>you,<s%> and that you may prolong your <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> which you shall <S%H3423>possess.<s%>
